Generation V.Black: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
Generation V.White: They go wherever the wind takes them. On rainy days, their bodies are heavier, so they take shelter beneath big trees.
Generation V.Black 2: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
Generation V.White 2: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

Generation VI.X: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
Generation VI.Y: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

Generation VII.Sun: When it finds others of its kind, they all stick together. When enough of them have collected, the mass resembles a cumulonimbus cloud.
Generation VII.Moon: Pillows and beds stuffed with cotton exhaled by Cottonee are soft and puffy, light and airy—altogether top quality.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: To protect itself, it shoots cotton from its body. When it gets wet in the rain, its cotton grows moist and heavy, and it can't move as well.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: When attacked, it expels cotton from its body to create a diversion. The cotton it loses grows back in quickly.

Generation VIII.Sword: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.
Generation VIII.Shield: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that's highly prized by many luxury brands.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Pillows and beds stuffed with cotton exhaled by Cottonee are soft and puffy, light and airy— altogether top quality.
Generation IX.Violet: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

Generation V.Black: Pinwheel Forest (inner), Lostlorn Forest , Abundant Shrine
Generation V.Black 2: Pinwheel Forest (inner), Lostlorn Forest , Castelia City , Abundant Shrine , Victory Road

Generation VII.Sun: Malie Garden , Melemele Meadow , Poni Meadow , Poni Plains , Ula'ula Meadow
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Malie Garden , Melemele Meadow , Poni Meadow , Poni Plains , Ula'ula Meadow

Generation VIII.Sword: Trade Minccino in Hulbury Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Bridge Field , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Trade Minccino in Hulbury Stony Wilderness Dappled Grove , Bridge Field , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Ballimere Lake Frostpoint Field , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
